Summary: Very bright very large with sparkle crafts all over it ...
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were fishin enjoying the no moon up yet sky, When we both saw some lights competing from the east to the south west. The light in front was bright and fast with spakeling lights in a v formation they all were moving very fast. No sound at all.. We don't believe them to be aircraft you can see them all over,these were not the same.. Then like a half an hour later the came back from south west to north east over needles California towards Kingman arizona.. When they went by us. 2 very very bright lights stopped in the sky hovered silently blinked out and 1 came back on these 3 lights were the brightest lights in the entire sky It was totally clear out last night.. We just don't know what we saw
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Kingman
There were no other sightings in Kingman on or around July 7th 2012
